trans-unit.source: @wkcd has a good example of how to overcome by installing django-markdown-deux:
trans-unit.target: @wkcd有一个很好的例子，说明如何通过安装 django-markdown-deux 来克服：

trans-unit.source: PAGEDOWN_IMAGE_UPLOAD_EXTENSIONS can be used to limit the extensions allowed for upload (default is jpg, jpeg, png, webp)
trans-unit.target: PAGEDOWN_IMAGE_UPLOAD_EXTENSIONS 可用于限制允许上传的扩展名（默认为 jpg ， jpeg ， png ， webp ）

trans-unit.source: PAGEDOWN_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH can be used to change the path within your media root (default is pagedown-uploads)
trans-unit.target: PAGEDOWN_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH 可用于更改媒体根目录内的路径（默认为 pagedown-uploads ）

trans-unit.source: contrib.markdown was deprecated in Django 1.5 meaning you can no longer use the markdown filter in your template by default.
trans-unit.target: contrib.markdown 在Django 1.5中已弃用，这意味着默认情况下您将无法再在模板中使用 markdown 过滤器。

trans-unit.source: A Django app that allows the easy addition of Stack Overflow's 'PageDown' markdown editor to a django form field
trans-unit.target: 一个Django应用程序,它允许轻松地将Stack Overflow的 "PageDown "标记编辑器添加到一个django表单字段中。

trans-unit.source: Add Stack Overflow's "Pagedown" Markdown editor to your Django Admin or custom form.
trans-unit.target: 将Stack Overflow的“ Pagedown” Markdown编辑器添加到Django Admin或自定义表单中。

trans-unit.source: Add PAGEDOWN_IMAGE_UPLOAD_ENABLED=True to your settings
trans-unit.target: 将 PAGEDOWN_IMAGE_UPLOAD_ENABLED=True 添加到您的设置

trans-unit.source: Add pagedown.apps.PagedownConfig to your INSTALLED_APPS
trans-unit.target: 将 pagedown.apps.PagedownConfig 添加到您的 INSTALLED_APPS

trans-unit.source: Check out the pagedown_init.js script to see how the upload is being performed on the client side.
trans-unit.target: 查看 pagedown_init.js 脚本，以了解如何在客户端执行上载。

trans-unit.source: Collect the static files: python manage.py collectstatic
trans-unit.target: 收集静态文件： python manage.py collectstatic

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Widget
trans-unit.target: 自定义小工具

trans-unit.source: Django Pagedown
trans-unit.target: Django Pagedown

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 例子

trans-unit.source: Get the code: pip install django-pagedown
trans-unit.target: 获取代码： pip install django-pagedown

trans-unit.source: If you want to customize the widget, the easiest way is to simply extend it:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想自定义小部件,最简单的方法就是简单地扩展它。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the pagedown editor in a django admin field, there are numerous possible approaches:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在django管理字段中使用pagedown编辑器,有许多可能的方法。

trans-unit.source: Image Uploads
trans-unit.target: 图片上传

trans-unit.source: Include the pagedown paths in your urls.py so that the upload endpoint is available
trans-unit.target: 在您的 urls.py 中包括pagedown路径，以便可以使用上载终结点

trans-unit.source: Inside the Django Admin:
trans-unit.target: Django Admin:

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have set a MEDIA_URL and MEDIA_ROOT so that uploads will be propertly saved
trans-unit.target: 确保设置了 MEDIA_URL 和 MEDIA_ROOT ,以便正确保存上传内容

trans-unit.source: Outside the Django Admin:
trans-unit.target: 在Django Admin.NET之外的地方。

trans-unit.source: Rendering Markdown
trans-unit.target: 渲染标记符

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 所需经费

trans-unit.source: The following options are available via your settings to tweak how the image upload works:
trans-unit.target: 以下选项可以通过您的设置来调整图片上传的工作方式。

trans-unit.source: The widget can be used both inside the django admin or independendly.
trans-unit.target: 小部件既可以在django管理内使用,也可以独立使用。

trans-unit.source: Then define your urls/views:
trans-unit.target: 然后定义你的urls/views。

trans-unit.source: This will add the URL /pagedown/image-upload/ endpoint to your project. You can see the default view that handles the upload here
trans-unit.target: 这会将URL /pagedown/image-upload/ 端点添加到您的项目中。您可以在此处查看处理上传的默认视图

trans-unit.source: To do so:
trans-unit.target: 要做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: To only use it on particular fields, first create a form (in forms.py):
trans-unit.target: 要仅在特定字段上使用它，请首先创建一个表单（在 forms.py 中）：

trans-unit.source: To use it in allTextField's in your admin form:
trans-unit.target: 要在您的管理表单中的所有 TextField 中使用它，请执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: To use the widget outside of the django admin, first create a form similar to the above but using the basic PagedownWidget:
trans-unit.target: 要在django管理员之外使用小部件，请首先创建一个与上述类似的表单，但要使用基本的 PagedownWidget ：

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Version >= 2.0.0 of django-pagedown requires Django 2.1.0 or above (previous versions should support Django all the way back to around 1.1).
trans-unit.target: django-pagedown 的> = 2.0.0版本需要Django 2.1.0或更高版本（以前的版本应该一直支持Django直至1.1左右）。

trans-unit.source: You can enable image uploads, allowing your users to upload new images to the server and have them automatically inserted into the Pagedown widget (instead of just adding image URLs):
trans-unit.target: 您可以启用图片上传,允许您的用户上传新的图片到服务器,并将其自动插入到Pagedown部件中(而不仅仅是添加图片URL)。

trans-unit.source: You can see a fully-fledged example of the widget in django-pagedown-example
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 django-pagedown-example 中看到小部件的完整示例

trans-unit.source: and in your admin.py:
trans-unit.target: 并在您的 admin.py 中：

trans-unit.source: then create the template and load the javascipt and css required to create the editor:
trans-unit.target: 然后创建模板并加载创建编辑器所需的javascipt和css。
